pageContext.claim: “Our military budget is three times more, and even four times more than the second largest spender of money. All right? It's more than that. Four times more, plus.”
pageContext.analysis: All U.S. defense spending at $732 billion equals slightly more than the rest of the world’s combined. China spends the second largest amount —$266 billion — on defense. That’s a little more than a third (not a quarter as Trump suggests) of what the U.S. spends.
